thread.title: Julian Edelman was mic'd up during his incredible catch, and the audio is great

author: Dave DeLuca (david.deluca@performgroup.com)
title: Julian Edelman was mic'd up during his incredible catch, and the audio is great
text:
Updated at 1:41 a.m. ET 
Updated at 1:41 a.m. ET 
Julian Edelman's heroic catch in the final moments of Super Bowl 51 was a jaw-droppingÂ sight. 
The audio is just as good. 
Thanks to "Inside the NFL," we have micâd-up footage of the play. You can hearÂ EdelmanÂ shout, âI caught it! I caught itâ as referees run over to make the call.Â 
Watch the play unfold below: UNREAL đł Watch @Patriots ' @Edelman11 mic'd up making the most clutch catch in #SB51 . #InsideTheNFL finale TONIGHT 9p ET/PT. #Patriots pic.twitter.com/pbBEoMAo9l â Inside the NFL (@insidetheNFL) February 7, 2017 
After the game,Â Edelman said theÂ catch wasÂ "70 percent luck and 30 percent skill." You certainly can't tell that by the confidence in Edelman's voice. Watch This
